About August Moon Chinese Restaurant August Moon Chinese Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 506 N 12th St in Murray, KY . August Moon Chinese Restaurant has been described as an Exceptional Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 7 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, Chinese Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for August Moon Chinese Restaurant
All Reviews for August Moon Chinese Restaurant
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
7
Decor
7
Service
7
They never have what I order. Takes the wait staff forever just to bring your drinks. Our waitress was rude and unconcerned with the fact that we were not happy with the food or service. They could not find a manager. Will not ever go back to the Bowie store.
Overall Rating
7
"Exceptional"
